attributes.action: Let driving tests continue during lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Driving tests should not be cancelled during lockdown if schools will still be open. A driving school is also a school. It would be more likely for students to get covid-19 from the school/ college they are attending rather than with one more person in a car, while taking the needed precautions.
attributes.background: While schools and colleges are going to stay open during lockdown, the driving tests should also continue going as they have until now.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
